void BatteryChargerConfigure::displayErrorMessage (const QString)
 Error Message.

Detailed Description

These functions provide functionality for the Battery Charger Configure Window in which basic configuration controls are set by the user and programmed into the unit information block. It provides access to the advanced configuration dialogue.

Function Documentation

BatteryChargerConfigure::BatteryChargerConfigure ( AcqUnit *  u,
QWidget *  parent = 0 
) [inherited]

Constructor.

The Application Information Block has the following entries: [0] Channel Type/Number (0x31) [1-2] Battery Capacity "C" in AH (not used by the device but kept for reference) [3-4] Float Charge Threshold Voltage (default 13.5V) [5-6] Maximum Float Charge Current (default 0.3C) [7-8] Cyclic Charge Threshold Voltage (default 14.4V) [9-10] Cyclic Charge Cutoff Current (default 0.02C)

Parameters:
u Acquisition Unit Object
parent Parent widget.

Build the User Interface display from Ui object.

Setup the Charger Model defaults
